atDirectives.name: @import-normalize
atDirectives.description: PostCSS Normalize lets you use the parts of normalize.css or sanitize.css that you need from your browserslist.

atDirectives.name: @import-glob
atDirectives.description: The plugin postcss-import can now import each file

atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: A utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: @applyを使用して、既存のユーティリティクラスを独自のカスタムCSSにインライン化します。

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: The @layer rule declares a cascade layer, with the option to assign style rules.

atDirectives.name: @custom-media
atDirectives.description: PostCSS Custom Media lets you use Custom Media Queries in CSS, following the CSS Media Queries specification.
